title: Creep Block Solution!!!
body:
The simplest thing I can think of without it ruining the entire game would be for the minions to move out of your way.
While they already do that to a certain extent, it's obvious that the amount of distance they move to go around you is insufficient.
Instead of the creeps touching you first and then moving out of the way, how about they do the same, but without the touching.
(So they just move out the way)

Most of the time, creep block happens when a new wave appears and you want to leave, due to dolla dolla bills or immediate danger.  (>.>) {{champion:92}} 
So if you needed to retreat, the minions move out of the way! IT'S FULL PROOF!!!!!!

Some of you might be asking; ''But beautiful and amazing Borky, what if the minions were attacking?''
An easy and simple solution, the minions would cancel their autos and not deal any damage to the enemy or enemy creeps while you run.. I mean tactical retreat.
That would be the price you'd have to pay, a slight advancement of enemy creeps.

Of course, this wouldn't apply to champions who can go through minions from some ability or item.

In conclusion, the creeps would use their eyes (OwO they have eyes, amazing) to move out of your way and in consequence cancel their attacks.
Personally, I think this would be the best solution without it harming the game too much. Of course, people would have to program things and whatnot, but that's their jobs... Upvoting this would be a real treat. maybe (and hopefully) the devs at Rito would see this remarkable solution and implement it into the game, please support this 
{{sticker:sg-lux}}

Of course, but then all you have to do is keep walking back and forth in the wave to keep shoving minions around so they'll lower their dps against the enemy minions.
thats actually a mechanic in dota 2. You do that so that  your minions fight starts closer to your turret in the start of the game. a little tweaking to that idea can solve it most definitely
